name: Dennis
description:
Go deeper. Descend into the depths. What awaits at your journeys end? Become Dennis, a remarkably humanoid creature. In fact were it not for his startling lack of arms and mysterious appearing grappling hook, one would take Dennis as a human. Embark through the dark, and try to not lose your light.

Created by:

Justin Bryant

Chris Brewer

Mo Morris

Alex Myers

Katelyn Zenz
